page.title: 19AMENITIES,UPPER KILLAY
page.content:
{Cila Primary School { }Opened in 1912, the School caters for children of this village only. Residential development in the 1950's and 1960's necessitated the addition of a pre-fabricated classroom. With a decline in the number of children in recent years it has been possible to add a nursery class.
{Congregational Chapel { }Built in 1911,the Chapel facilities are used by the local branch of the Women's Institute,Brownies and Guides.
{Community Centre { }This was opened in 1981 and is used by several local organisations such as the Senior Citizens,Mother & Toddler Group,Embroidery and Sewing Club,the Cricket Club and Horticultural Society.
